Plugin xpl_time¶

Purpose¶

This plugin send date and time regulary on xPL network. Alone this plugin is useless : he is used by scenariis for checking date and time.

Plugin configuration¶

Enabling plugin¶

You can enable plugin by using:

$ dmgenplug xpl_time

You just have to reload administration page to see the plugin in the list.

Configuration¶

In Domogik administration, go to datetime configuration page. There is no specific configuration for this plugin.

Start plugin¶

You can now start the plugin (start button).

Devices and widgets¶

There is no need (and no way) to create a device, and so to set widgets on UI for this plugin.

Developper notes¶

xPL schema¶

The DATETIME.BASIC schema is used by this plugin.

Example:

xpl-trig
{
...
}
datetime.basic
{
datetime=20110308115010
date=20110308
time=115010
format1=201103081150101
}
  • datetime : <yyyymmddhhmmss>
  • date : <yyyymmdd>
  • time : <hhmmss>
  • format1 : <yyyymmddhhmmss+weekday>
